name: 疾病營養研究
description: 本課程探討各種臨床疾病的流行病學、病理學、臨床處治與營養研究新知，針對最新之期刊論文，藉由分組討論評析、專家講座等方式，使學生了解營養研究對疾病治療的影響，例如diabetes mellitus、dementia、cardio vascular disease、psychology、cancer、kidney disease等。
goals: 了解如何研究營養與疾病的關係
了解營養研究對疾病治療的影響
學習期刊論文評析的能力
syllabus:
1.Introduction to disease nutrition &general consideration

2.Topic of diabetes mellitus

3.Group discussion on nutrition and DM

4.Topic of dementia (Dr. Liu, Taipei CityHospital)

5.Group discussion on dementia

6.Topic of gastrointestinal disease (Dr.Shih, Taipei City Hospital)

7.Group discussion on nutrition andgastrointestinal disease

8.The mid-term exam week

9.Topic of cardio vascular disease (Dr. Tsai,Taipei City Hospital)

10.Group discussion on nutrition and cardiovascular disease

11.Topic of cancer (Dr. Lu, Taipei CityHospital)

12.Group discussion on nutrition and cancer

13.Topicof nutrition and kidney disease (Ms. Tsai, Mackay Memorial Hospital)

14.Group discussion on nutrition and kidneydisease

15.Oral reports (1st group)

16.Oral reports (2ed group)

17.Oral reports (3rd group)

18.The final exam week
